Description.Text: Hotel The Pera Hill is located in the historical area of Beyoglu which is a newly designed boutique hotel which has 35 rooms includes single, twin/double, triple and family rooms. Hotel services are 7/24 front desk, Restaurant, Bar, Newspapers, Safety deposit box, Lift/elevator, Luggage storage, Air conditioning, Laundry, Dry cleaning, free of charge Wi-Fi in all areas, Airport shuttle (extra cost), Car parking (private/extra cost). The main touristic attractions around the hotel are Pera Museum, Galata Tower, Military Museum, Dolmabahce Palace, Sea of Marmara and Golden Horn. There is also very easy access to reach to Sultanahmet where Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Grand Bazaar, Egyptian Bazaar, Suleymaniye Mosque take 10 min by car. Taksim Metro Stop is a 10-minute and Bus Stop is a 2-minute walking distance from the hotel. Beyoglu Tunel Funicular Station is also a 2-minute walk away where you can reach to the Galata Bridge directly. Tunel Tram Stop is just 150 metres away, taking passengers with 3 stops to the historic Sultanahmet district. Hotel The Pera Hill is just 20 km distance from Ataturk Airport and 50 km distance from Sabiha Gokcen Airport by driving. Early check-in is subject to the availability. Any early check-in request is to be asked at the reception desk upon the guest's arrival at the hotel.

Hotel The Pera Hill is located in the historical area of Beyoglu as called Pera, meaning 'opposite shore' to the harbor of the Golden Horn, or Galata in Byzantine times, is today's Taksim downtown and dining area. In its lifetime it has seen Jewish, Italian and French inhabitants and this is evident today in its variety of churches, historical buildings, picturesque arcades, old Ottoman hans and bazaars and fine restaurants, all easily visitable in one area over a couple of hours. Istiklal Street where The 1.2 km pedestrianized street leading from the Square down to Tunel is packed with an arbitrary scattering of music and bookstores, movie theaters and cultural centers, cafes, restaurants and bars, commercial banks and offices, shopping outlets and bazaars, consulates and embassies, churches, historical arcades and passageways.

Triple Room - Triple Room Refundable offers one double bed and one twin bed with air conditioning , alarm clock, french balcony, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, mini bar, non-smoking /smoking rooms, room service (limited), safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. Standard Single Room which has the wooden floor and floor-to-ceiling window with french balcony includes two single beds or one double bed, free Wi-Fi, desk and slippers.
Double Room - Double Room Non Refundable offers two twin bed or one double bed with air conditioning , alarm clock, french balcony, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, en suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, mini bar, non-smoking /smoking rooms, room service (limited), safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. Standard Single Room which has the wooden floor and floor-to-ceiling window with french balcony includes two single beds or one double bed, free Wi-Fi, desk and slippers.

Family Room has two rooms and one connection door between two rooms. In each room has its own bathroom, TV and minibar
